channel.title: Problem with graphics controller
channel.description: Hi there. When im running the VMSVGA graphics controller on whonix i have no screen lags, everything would be ok, but the guest display is not resizing. When I use the default VBOXVGA the screen scales, but the lags are causing the system to be unusable. I read about a bug, but is it really a bug? Version XFCE.

item.title: Problem with graphics controller
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Should be same as a Debian VM. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle applies. VirtualBox support might know more.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with graphics controller
item.dc:creator: o10767761
item.description:
Hi there. When im running the VMSVGA graphics controller on whonix i have no screen lags, everything would be ok, but the guest display is not resizing.
When I use the default VBOXVGA the screen scales, but the lags are causing the system to be unusable.
I read about a bug, but is it really a bug? Version XFCE.

Read full topic
